title: Ratan Tata ignited passion for EVs, inspired to set up Ola Electric: Bhavish Aggarwal
description: Ola Founder Bhavish Aggarwal reveals how Ratan Tata inspired the creation of Ola Electric, sharing moments from 2017 when Tata's passion for EVs led to the start of the venture. Tata's enthusiasm and guidance significantly influenced Aggarwal, who fondly recounts Tata's personal investment, love for animals, and final meeting discussing Ola Electric's IPO before his passing.
